nodes.name: The Pit
nodes.description: The air smells of ozone and unwashed bodies. Sleeping pods are stacked like coffins three high. Your bunk is a dent in the wall.

interactions.text: Your bunk. The mattress is thin, but it's yours.

nodes.name: Jed's Workshop
nodes.description: Cluttered, warm, and loud. A workbench sits in the center, covered in scavenged droid parts.

interactions.text: Jed's pride and joy. He can fix anything with a hammer and bad language.

nodes.name: Trade Row
nodes.description: A neon-lit scar in the rock. Miners barter company scrip for contraband and recyc-whiskey.

nodes.name: Med-Bay
nodes.description: Sterile white tiles stained with grime. The hum of bio-scanners covers the sound of coughing miners.

nodes.name: Admin Gate
nodes.description: Massive blast doors block the way to the Logistics Sector. A checkpoint booth sits behind reinforced glass.

interactions.text: Standard Dominion bio-lock. It needs a badge or a breach.

nodes.name: Transit Checkpoint
nodes.description: The threshold between the living quarters and the work zones. The air here is filtered and cold.

nodes.name: Logistics Concourse
nodes.description: A massive open atrium where ore crates are routed. The ceiling is lost in shadow.

nodes.name: Server Room
nodes.description: Rows of blinking server racks kept at sub-zero temperatures. It hums with the colony's data.

nodes.name: Deep Mine Elevator
nodes.description: A heavy industrial lift that descends into the dark.

nodes.name: Deep Mine Sector 4
nodes.description: Old tunnels, unsupported and dripping. The sensors glitch out here.

nodes.name: Ancient Chamber
nodes.description: The rock gives way to smooth, impossible geometry. A low hum vibrates in your teeth.

interactions.text: The Tuning Fork. It sings to you.

nodes.name: Cargo Launch Bay
nodes.description: Cargo rails stretch up toward the shield. A single pod sits on the pad.
